## GLOBAL CLASS TRANSLATIONS
##I am pulling out many of the keys that are class based from individual translation files, such as Groups and Forms, and pulling them into this translation file. This is being done to avoid duplicate lookup strings across translation files.
## To view the different classes, go here. http://next.dev.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/CurrikiSpaceClass?editor=class
## I am also adding to this trans file elements that are used globally but not in class. Media Type roll over text for example.
##FROM GWT or XWIKI CORE loading.loading_msg=Loading, please wait... problemoccured=A problem occurred while trying to process your request. Please email webmaster@curriki.org if this happens again.
## ##ASSET CLASS USED IN RESOURCES
## CATEGORIES / MEDIA TYPES PLUS COLLECTIONS AND FOLDERS

##CATEGORY AND / OR FILE TYPE ##Although the below are not taken from the Assets, that is, these most of these values are NOT stored in the classes, I am adding them to this file because they are global. Todd December 31, 2008.
archive.sco=Archive: sco archive.zip=Archive: zip archive.gz=Archive: gz archive.xo=Archive: xo archive.sit=Achive: sit archive.gtar=Archive: gtar archive.tar=Archive: tar audio.wav=Audio: wav audio.mp3=Audio: mp3 ##The next two are duplicates from above. Should be able to remove these once the above are approved. If the above changes, then these will need stay. collection.collection=Collection collection.folder=Folder document.notebook=Attached File: notebook document.odt=Attached File: odt document.odg=Attached File: odg document.odp=Attached File: odp document.ods=Attached File: ods document.odc=Attached File: odc document.odf=Attached File: odf document.odb=Attached File: odb document.odi=Attached File: odi document.ppt=Attached File: ppt document.pptx=Attached File: pptx document.doc=Attached File: doc document.docx=Attached File: docx document.pdf=Attached File: pdf document.xls=Attached File: xls document.xlsx=Attached File: xlsx document.txt=Attached File: txt document.xml=Attached File: xml document.css=Attached File: css document.rtf =Attached File: rtf document.dcr=Attached File: cdcr document.dir=Attached File: dir document.exe=Attached File: exe document.bin=Attached File: bin document.iha=Attached File: iha document.izh=Attached File: izh document.class=Attached File: class document.php=Attached File: php document.jar=Attached File: jar document.ps=Attached File: ps unknown.unknown=Unknown ##I added the below string as the one above is not working.
